citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15am on 08-JUL-
22. The inspector knocked on doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before departing
the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15am on 08-JUL-
22.  The inspector knocked on doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before departing 
the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
